title: Encoding & Representation
description: Capturing and visualizing complex structures from qualitative and abstract data.

title: Evolution & Adaptation
description: Understanding how networked systems grow and adapt to varied environments.

title: Dynamics & Function
description: Exploring the relationship between network structure and system behavior.

title: Computation & Discovery
description: Applying algorithmic tools to identify hidden patterns in complex systems.

title: Natural & Mental Systems
description: Investigating the network architecture of biological and cognitive processes.

title: Foundational Frameworks
description: Developing new mathematical tools and interdisciplinary methods for complex systems.
